thread.title: Global economy: services PMIs slow in China, Japan

title: Global economy: services PMIs slow in China, Japan
text:
Global economy: services PMIs slow in China, Japan 2:25pm BST - 01:38 
China's services sector growth eased to a four-month low in March as new business and employment grew at a slower rate, while activity in Japan's service sector expanded at the slowest pace in 17 months. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
China's services sector growth eased to a four-month low in March as new business and employment grew at a slower rate, while activity in Japan's service sector expanded at the slowest pace in 17 months. David Pollard reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2q58by9
